title: How to Make Microwaved Macaroni and Cheese Taste Better

steps.headline: Finely chop the onion.
steps.description: You don't want large chunks of onion in your pasta! Dicing the onion works best.

steps.headline: Grate the mozzarella and cheddar cheese, so you have about a quarter cup of each kind.
steps.description: If they are already shredded, pour a quarter cup of each kind.

steps.headline: Cook the macaroni.
steps.description: Follow the instructions on the box, and then take out of the microwave carefully. Pour the cheese from the package into the Macaroni and stir.

steps.headline: Put the finely chopped onion in to your taste.
steps.description: Then add the cheddar and mozzarella cheese and stir the mac and cheese while it is still hot so the added cheese melts in.

steps.headline: If the feta did not come crumbled, crumble some on top of the macaroni to your taste.
steps.description: Garnish with herbs of your taste.

text: Gather your ingredients.  Finely chop the onion. You don't want large chunks of onion in your pasta! Dicing the onion works best. Grate the mozzarella and cheddar cheese, so you have about a quarter cup of each kind. If they are already shredded, pour a quarter cup of each kind. Cook the macaroni. Follow the instructions on the box, and then take out of the microwave carefully. Pour the cheese from the package into the Macaroni and stir. Put the finely chopped onion in to your taste. Then add the cheddar and mozzarella cheese and stir the mac and cheese while it is still hot so the added cheese melts in. If the feta did not come crumbled, crumble some on top of the macaroni to your taste. Garnish with herbs of your taste. Let cool and enjoy!
